name: Tripplus Travel Service Inc
description: Operator of an online travel service company designed to intended an online meta-search engine for travel-related purposes. The company's platform can be used by users to book flight tickets and make hotel reservations along with an opportunity to earn reward points, enabling travelers to accumulate, redeem points, and get discounts on travel bookings.
one_liner: Operator of an online travel service company designed to intended an online meta-search engine for travel-related purposes. The company's platform can be used by users to book flight tickets and make hotel reservations along with an opportunity to earn reward points, enabling travelers to accumulate, redeem points, and get discounts on travel bookings.
